ListPreference.android:title: Emote Mode (Nitro Emote Spoof)
ListPreference.android:summary: Read the explanation below for what each option does!

mods.preference.SimpleDialogPreference.android:title: Emote Mode Explanation
mods.preference.SimpleDialogPreference.android:dialogMessage:
Nitro Spoof - Turns the emotes into PNG and GIF urls, which every client can see. Doesn't work well with sending multiple emotes in the same message, but it's the best we've got.

Nitro Spoof (Bigger Emotes) same as above but the emote size is 64px instead of 48px

Nitro Spoof (Full Size) removes the "size" parameter from the URL, making it a larger and full quality image

Old Nitro Spoof - Encodes the emotes into a format that only other Bluecord and Cut The Cord users can see. All other users *CANNOT* see the emotes!

Hide Locked Emotes - All emotes you don't have will not be shown as an option when choosing emotes to send or react with

Off - Behaves as normal Discord does. Leave this option selected if you own Nitro.

NOTE: You cannot use the spoofed emotes to add new reactions, it will result in an error

SwitchPreference.android:title: Nitro Sticker Spoof
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If you don't have Nitro, stickers will be sent as URLs when clicked\nNOTE: this will not work for most animated stickers

ListPreference.android:title: Anti Message Delete
ListPreference.android:summary: Deleted messages will stay in your chat log until you switch chats or refresh the app. Logged messages are saved to storage/Bluecord/Deleted Messages

ListPreference.android:title: Anti Message Edit
ListPreference.android:summary: Edited messages will stay in your chat log until you switch chats or refresh the app. Edited messages are saved to storage/Bluecord/Edited Messages

SwitchPreference.android:title: Show Edit Timestamp
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, the time of the most recent edit will be visible

SwitchPreference.android:title: Voice Messages
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, you can send voice messages to others

SwitchPreference.android:title: Anti Reaction Delete
SwitchPreference.android:summary: When someone else removes a message reaction, their reaction will stay visible

SwitchPreference.android:title: Better Status Indicators
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Adds a new status icon for web (discord.com browser) users. This icon will also show up for bots.\nNOTE: the browser icon may not show up if the user is also online on mobile or desktop

SwitchPreference.android:title: Disable Typing
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Others will not see you typing. Discord can possibly detect this, use at your own risk!

ListPreference.android:title: Show User Details
ListPreference.android:summary: Shows account creation time and server join time (if in a server) when viewing any profile\n\nNote: for exact creation time, you can use the "Timestamp Format" option below to customize it

SwitchPreference.android:title: Show last message
SwitchPreference.android:summary: When enabled, the time of the last message sent will be shown when viewing any profile

SwitchPreference.android:title: Do Not Add
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Automatically leaves groups that you are added to\nNOTE: Bluecord needs to be running for this to work

SwitchPreference.android:title: Reject Incoming Calls
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Automatically rejects incoming calls\nNOTE: Bluecord needs to be running for this to work

SwitchPreference.android:title: Hide Blocked Messages
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Blocked messages will be completely hidden

ListPreference.android:title: Show Username
ListPreference.android:summary: Choose whether to show the username and tag for messages

SwitchPreference.android:title: Show Character Count
SwitchPreference.android:summary: The message box will show the character count and capacity

SwitchPreference.android:title: Show File Sizes
SwitchPreference.android:summary: The media picker will show file sizes.\nIf it is over your allowed limit, it will be highlighted in red

SwitchPreference.android:title: Media Spoilers
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Media you send will automatically be turned into spoilers

SwitchPreference.android:title: Always Show Embed Links
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Always show the URL link on messages with embeds

SwitchPreference.android:title: Always Disable Reply Mentions
SwitchPreference.android:summary: When enabled, the mention option when replying to another message is always off by default

SwitchPreference.android:title: Reveal Hidden Channels
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Hidden channels in guilds will be shown with the name and include "(HIDDEN)"\nNOTE: YOU CANNOT, AND NEVER WILL BE ABLE TO READ OR SEND MESSAGES IN HIDDEN CHANNELS!

SwitchPreference.android:title: Reveal Spoiler Messages
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Messages containing spoilers will automatically be revealed (including spoilers you send)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Hide Pronouns
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Hide pronouns of users on their profile sheets

SwitchPreference.android:title: Exact Timestamps
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Shows exact date and time on every message

ListPreference.android:title: Timestamp Format
ListPreference.android:summary: Choose what format to display timestamps in
